PRINT FORMAT SIZE (pixel)
Printer - Class in it.gdapplicazioni.easy.gui
CLASS FOR INSTANTIATION AND MANAGEMENT OF PRINT OBJECT
- Supports whole frame printing
- Supports printing of frame components
- Supports printing of a document in a JTextPane
- Supports setting print margins and component sizing
- Print orientation portrait or landscape
- Print sizes A0 to A5
Printer(Component, JFrame) - Constructor for class it.gdapplicazioni.easy.gui.Printer
CONSTRUCTOR FOR FULL OBJECT INSTANTIATION
printStart(String, int, int, double, double, double) - Method in class it.gdapplicazioni.easy.gui.Printer
METHOD FOR PRINTING FRAMES OR FRAME COMPONENTS ON A SINGLE PAGE
FOR CENTER PAGE PRINTING:
- marginLeft = 0
- marginRight = 0
printStart(String, int) - Method in class it.gdapplicazioni.easy.gui.Printer
METHOD FOR PRINTING DOCUMENTS IN JTEXTPANE
- The component must be sized for the final print format
- Supports multipage printing
